Name: VR Long March
About the game: In the long march of VR, you can experience the harsh environment encountered by the Red Army and learn the spirit of hard work.Recovery by VR technique key events in the history of the communist party of China, let learners through VR headsets, immersive feeling and to participate in the event, to promote learners' learning interest, strengthen learning and learning effect.
